title: Episode 115: David Berkowitz "Son of Sam" Live at the Gramercy Theater in NYC
description:
This is the copy of our live show from the magical Gramercy Theater in NYC. We take a deep dive into David Berkowitz AKA Son of Sam or Son of Pearl. Hope you enjoy this, because David Berkowitz is the OG Dennis Rader. 

Visit our Sponsors!

Counterclock
Go Subscribe or follow CounterClock right now wherever you’re listening and check out the first two episodes today. That’s CounterClock, all one word, and you can find it on Apple, Spotify or at Counterclockpodcast.com. You won’t want to miss a single minute of this show.
